text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea balanocarpoides (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, White Meranti or Yellow Meranti) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is found in Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia and Borneo.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea balanocarpoides". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33104A9756161. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33104A9756161.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
